description:
If you're a beginner keyword researcher who wants to know the secrets of keyword research, SEO, and content marketing, then you're about to discover how to get on page one of the search engines including Google, Yahoo, and Bing right now!


In fact, if you want to know learn the basics of keyword research and search engine optimization, then this new Udemy course - "Keyword Research Made Easy" - gives you the answers to 19 important questions and challenges every beginner keyword researcher faces, including:

- What is keyword research and SEO?
- What tools do I need to perform keyword research?
- How do I determine a good keyword from a bad keyword?
- How many keywords do I need to find?
- How do I use those keywords in my content?
... and more!

So, if you're serious about wanting to get on page one of the search engines including Google, Yahoo, and Bing and you want to know learn the basics of keyword research and search engine optimization, then you need to grab a copy of "Keyword Research Made Easy" right now, because keyword research Expert, Rick Grubb, will reveal to you how every beginner keyword researcher, regardless of experience level, can succeed - Today!
title: Keyword Research Made Easy
